import Head from 'next/head' import styles from '../styles/Home.module.css' import Main from '../components/Main' import Time from '../components/Time' import { useState, useEffect} from 'react' import useWindowDimensions from '../helpers/useWindowDimensions' import Mobile from '../components/Mobile' export default function Home() { const [isMobile, setIsMobile] = useState(true) console.log("In Home: ",isMobile) useEffect(() => { console.log("In useEffect: ",isMobile) const width = useWindowDimensions().width setIsMobile(width < 700) },[isMobile]) return ( <> {isMobile ? :
Covid-19 Statistics
} ) }
